title: Customer_Analyzer v1: Fetch and store segment IDs + fit tiers for customer accounts

sections.text: Implement the initial integration layer to call Customer_Analyzer and retrieve segment IDs and fit tier for accounts referenced by ingested support conversations. Persist these fields on the Issue_Tracker customer/account model with basic freshness metadata (e.g., last_fetched_at) and handle missing/unknown values gracefully. This ticket focuses only on data retrieval and storage, not on priority weighting or UI/analytics slicing.
